Job Posting:170534 - Position: F25 .NET Software Developer Co-Op 170534 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 06/30/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 06/09/2025 03:58 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country FGF Brands 1295 Ormont Drive Toronto M9L 2W6 Ontario Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Fall F25 .NET Software Developer Co-Op 170534 Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: .NET SOFTWARE DEVELOPER CO-OP Job ID: 2025-19558 Get ready for a Naan-Traditional placement experience! We're not your average bakery. We're a team of passionate thinkers and doers that are challenging the idea of what a bakery can be. We operate like a startup, powered by creativity and a 'roll up your sleeves' mentality, to give our customers the best possible product. Job Summary Be part of an Agile Development team working on new application development using the latest Microsoft technologies. We are a tech savvy organization, where multiple development projects will provide you the opportunity to contribute to the growth of the organization and your personal career goals. It's a dynamic, fast paced environment with a sharp development team! Key Responsibilities • Design, implement, test and document web applications using .NET framework • Create web applications that support both desktop and mobile devices • Ensure that new code conforms to agreed coding and testing standards Meet the requirements and deadlines established for given projects • In compliance with Ontario's Bill 190, we confirm that this posting represents a current, existing vacancy within our organization. Job Requirements Key Qualifications • Post-secondary education in Computer Science or related studies • Up to date knowledge and experience with .NET and MVC applications • Experience in writing SQL queries for data definition and modification • Object oriented design and programming experience • Knowledge on JavaScript, CSS, Microsoft Azure, Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft Visual Studio, Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio • Mobile development experience • Eager and willing to learn new technologies Great team player and quick learner • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://careerscoopinternen-fgfbrands.icims.com/jobs/19558/.net-software-developer-co-op-%28fall-2025%29/job Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
